powergrid.plugins

Class PluginLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.plugins.PluginLoader

  • public class PluginLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class checks the plugins folder for jar files and loads their classes.

    It can also filter the loaded classes so that all loaded classes that extend a certain class can be retrieved.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginLoader(java.io.File folder)
      Create a new PluginLoader that loads all jar files in the specified folder.

      • getAllClasses

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<?>> getAllClasses()
        Returns all classes that were loaded in this PluginLoader.

        The returned Collection is immutable.

        Returns:
        all loaded classes in this PluginLoader
